name: Spooky Game Snacks EP
description:
Give it a minute to load. Controls: Mouse + Left Click.

Spooky Game Snacks EP is a collection of 5 bite-sized, Halloween-themed games.

Games By Aquma (Aquma4LIVEZ.com)
Music and SFX on "Witch Kitty" by clover & sealife (soundcloud)

Games:

  1. Pumpkin Butt
  2. Candy Corn is Gross
  3. Paleta de Coco
  4. Spider Friend
  5. Witch Kitty
